title: Create a 'Story Highlights' for Instagram
description: An editor wants to create a permanent 'Story Highlight' on the publication's Instagram profile for a major investigative series.

tasks.description: Gather all the Instagram Stories that were posted during the investigation.
tasks.expected_outcome: All relevant past stories are collected.

tasks.description: Select the best and most informative stories to include in the highlight reel.
tasks.expected_outcome: A curated selection of stories is made.

tasks.description: Create a new Story Highlight on the Instagram profile.
tasks.expected_outcome: A new highlight reel is created.

tasks.description: Give the highlight a clear title (e.g., 'The Investigation') and a custom cover photo.
tasks.expected_outcome: The highlight is clearly labeled and visually appealing on the profile.
